description: - IoT startup founded by ex-Google and ex-Morgan Stanley concentrated on intelligent level monitoring and automation of gas cylinders.
- Led an engineering research project to test the feasibility of a new technology within the product offering.
- Developed mechanical and electronic prototypes to test and evaluate.
- Gained industry knowledge liaising with experienced colleagues and consultants.
